ValidationRule.description: Quantity in discount products should always be 1 and the sales price should always be negative
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), OR( Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P000002EGGlQAO', Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P0000059vroQAA'), OR( AND( Quantity<>1, Quantity<>-1), Sales_Price_ARR__c>=0, Discount<>0) )
